forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. High 61F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
